lead_paragraph: Nigel Pearson says he will call upon his experience in helping stabilise English Premier League champions Leicester City in his new role as manager of East Midlands neighbours Derby County.

headline.print_headline: Pearson Will Use Leicester Experience to Develop Derby
headline.main: Pearson Will Use Leicester Experience to Develop Derby

snippet: Nigel Pearson says he will call upon his experience in helping stabilise English Premier League champions Leicester City in his new role as manager of East Midlands neighbours Derby County....
